main event: On 6th August 1956, a white, round, pulsing object about 200-300 yards in diameter, at an altitude of about 1000 feet, approached the observer and was observed for about 10 seconds. It then moved very fast and suddenly for 15 minutes with no sound.
interesting points: The UFO was described as white, round, and pulsing, with a significant size of 200-300 yards in diameter.
It approached the observer at a relatively low altitude of about 1000 feet and was observed for about 10 seconds.
The object then made a sudden, high-speed movement for 15 minutes without producing any sound.
A similar object was reported by someone else from the town, adding credibility to the sighting.
The report was addressed to various military and intelligence commands, including the Air Technical Intelligence Center at Wright-Patterson AFB.
